A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The movie is generally good\, good scenes etc. What bothers me the most was what they did with Rey and Kylo\, I mean\, what they did not do.

Kylo is a shit\, weak and whiny villain. Far from the siths that already existed\, a disrespect to their memory.

Rey is completely useless in the movie. A jedi? No training at all and they still want to sell her as a badass.

That's what bothered me the most and made me sad.

But it also has the fact that they simply take the phasm and snoke out of nowhere and without explanation\, after so much mystery and propaganda of the characters.
